library.description: A cozy library with a vast collection of books for all ages.

book.title: The Great Gatsby
book.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
book.preface: The Great Gatsby is a novel by American author F. Scott Fitzgerald.

sections.section: The book begins with the narrator, Nick Carraway, moving in to a small house in West Egg, Long Island.
Nick is neighbors with Jay Gatsby, a mysterious millionaire who throws lavish parties.
